attributes.action: make compulsory lessons in online ettiquette part of the national cirriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many people, when on forums and social networking sites such as Facebook, do not know how to behave online. Spam posting is an example of bad ettiquette, flooding (repeatedly posting replies to yourself) another. The internet would be a much better place if people were educated in this matter from an early age. It would also save on other people having to correct posts.
